original_title: Johnny Legend Presents: The Complete Weird Cartoons
overview: This collection of vintage cartoons is not only a loopy primer on animation history; it is also an offbeat reflection of western "civilization" in the early 20th century. The racism in "Little Black Sambo," and the overt sexuality of Betty Boop are all-the-more shocking when you think that this is what grandma and grandpa were growing up watching!  From the works of the worldÂ’s very first animator, Emile Cohl, to Walt Disney himself, Johnny Legend has compiled a twisted list of early animations that are guaranteed to surprise, delight and amaze.
tagline: The Greatest Collection of Twisted Cartoons and Awesome Animation Ever!
title: Johnny Legend Presents: The Complete Weird Cartoons
